title: BUG PLZ FIX RIOT
body: I was in a game as jax losing badly to a vlad and all of a sudden my ping spiked to 1000 and i dissconected then when i loaded client there was no reconnect button, and nothing in my match history, then i just started a new match????{{sticker:sg-lux-2}} {{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body: While not exactly a bug, this is something that can happen pretty rarely. What happened is that the game itself crashed on the server side and everyone else was booted from the match as well. You couldn't reconnect due to the game not existing anymore whatsoever. Nobody will get any penalties for that match though so no worries there.
